events.title: Not Just a Fair
story: From our own experiences of meeting at book fairs in other cities, we longed to create spaces to encounter fellow designers, researchers and multidisciplinary artists in Arnhem. We build on the zine and (art)books fair to become an interactive exhibition and cultural event. We stay in the margins, we keep printing, and together we hope to engage with the potential of publishing and printed matter to generate social change. By elaborating the idea of the art fair, we want to emphasise the special ecology of art and publishing that emerges in the encounters across international and local actors in the Netherlands.

With this open call we invite you to showcase your or your collective/collaborative works and participate in Not Just a Fair with publications, performance, video work, audio work, installation, workshop, lecture, public conversation and further interpretations and/or combinations of these guides.

events.title: Not Just a Library opening
story: “We stay in the margins. We keep printing.” facilitated by @not.just.a.collective

This year the fair will take place in NS16 Tilburg, close to the central station. Besides the book fair, Wobby Wonderland will also offer a program with talks and workshops. And on Friday night 9 December you can join us for a Wobby Club Night.

We are glad to invite you to join the first opening of Not Just a Library! Not Just a Library is an art zine library, but it is not only a library. It is a space for gatherings, showcasing artistic and experimental manners of publishing practices and printed matters. This space intends to expand the boundaries of the library outside the generally accepted definition that refers to the library functioning to collect, read, discuss and sell books. We set out to create a space that incentivises alternative ways for reading, looking and narrating.

The opening will take place on 16th of December, from 16:00- 20:00, at @platform_post (Driekoningenstraat 16, Arnhem, NL). We will facilitate a talk revolving around the topic “We stay in the margins. We keep printing.” Besides, we will provide food for the participants. For reducing food waste, we encourage people to sign up: https://www.eventbrite.com/manage/events/477309534667/details (or link in @not.just.a.collective bio)

events.title: Wobby Wonderland
story: Wobby Wonderland is a DIY publishing & printed matter fair, where independent publishers, artists and collectives sell their publications, zines, art prints and other printed matter.

This year the fair will take place in NS16 Tilburg, close to the central station. Besides the book fair, Wobby Wonderland will also offer a program with talks and workshops. And on Friday night 9 December you can join us for a Wobby Club Night.

events.title: Zine camp 2022
story: Zine Camp is coming closer and we are more than excited to announce the WORKSHOPS for this year's edition! On the Weekend of the 5th & 6th of November @zinecamp will offer a space to connect with the self publishing community!
You are interested in enhancing your skills by learning from fellow artists and creators?

events.title: Not Just a Library Open Call
events.summary: We are looking for experimental publishing practices and printed matters to display and(or) sell.
story: We are looking for experimental publishing practices and printed matters to display and(or) sell.

Not Just a Library is an art zine library, but it is not only a library. It is a space for gathering, showcasing artistic and experimental manners of publishing practices and printed matters. This space intends to expand the boundaries of the library outside the generally accepted definition that refers to the library as a tool to collect, read, discuss and sell books. We set out to create a space that incentivises alternative ways for reading, looking and narrating.
